title: Americans Pull $472,000,000,000 Out of US Banks in Three Months As Depositors Exit in Historic Numbers
description:
New numbers from the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) show Americans are pulling their money at a pace not seen in yearly four decades. According to the FDIC’s newly-released quarterly report, depositors took a total of $472 billion out of their accounts in the first quarter of this year â€“ shattering a 39 year record. […]

The post Americans Pull $472,000,000,000 Out of US Banks in Three Months As Depositors Exit in Historic Numbers appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
